item.title: Pareto vs. Gaussian
item.description: This means that large values are much more likely to occur under a Pareto distribution than under a Gaussian or Exponential distribution. For example, you are much more likely to meet someone whoâ€™s income is 10 times the average than someone whose height is ten times the average.

item.title: The Fundamentals of Heavy Tails: Properties, Emergence, and Estimation
item.description: The best book on the extreme value theory.
